meanings.sent1: The talented lithographer carefully created beautiful lithographs.
meanings.sent2: The lithographer displayed their artwork at the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The lithographer joked that they could turn anything into a lithograph, even a sandwich!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a lithographer, turning memories into vivid lithographs.
meanings.sent5: The lithographer's hands danced across the paper, bringing images to life.

meanings.sent1: She learned how to lithograph by following step-by-step instructions.
meanings.sent2: They lithograph their designs onto special plates for printing.
meanings.sent3: The artist decided to lithograph a picture of their cat wearing sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: His words lithograph a picture of a serene landscape in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The machine whirred to life, ready to lithograph the intricate design onto paper.
